Body.Build: Glass front, glass back, aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Nano-SIM and eSIM or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android 10, EMUI 10.1, no Google Play Services
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (2x2.86 GHz Cortex-A76 & 2x2.36 GHz Cortex-A76 & 4x1.95 GHz Cortex-A55)

Memory.Card slot: NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot)

Main Camera.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
8 MP, f/2.4, 80mm (telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
16 MP, f/2.2, 17mm (ultrawide), AF
Main Camera.Features: Leica optics, LED flash, panorama, HDR

Selfie camera.Single:
32 MP, f/2.0, 26mm (wide), 1/2.8", 0.8µm
IR TOF 3D, (biometrics sensor only)

Comms.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

Features.Sensors: Infrared Face ID, fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, color spectrum

Misc.Colors: Silver Frost, Blush Gold, Deep Sea Blue, Ice White, Black
